meanings.sent1: He kept mischarging the battery, so it never fully charged.
meanings.sent2: The cashier realized she was mischarging customers for the items.
meanings.sent3: The robot started mischarging itself, causing sparks to fly everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her mischarging of the phone led to it overheating dangerously.
meanings.sent5: The magician's wand seemed to be mischarging, shooting out sparks unexpectedly.

meanings.definition: To fail to charge or load properly.
meanings.sent1: The phone was mischarging, so it died quickly.
meanings.sent2: The truck mischarged the goods, causing delays in delivery.
meanings.sent3: The mischarging elevator kept getting stuck between floors.
meanings.sent4: The mischarging gun jammed during the crucial moment.
meanings.sent5: The mischarging laptop refused to turn on despite multiple attempts.

meanings.definition: The act of improperly charging or loading.
meanings.sent1: The mischarging of the car battery caused it to malfunction.
meanings.sent2: He was frustrated by the mischarging of the documents into the system.
meanings.sent3: The mischarging of the spaceship led to a chaotic launch sequence.
meanings.sent4: The mischarging of the camera resulted in blurry photos.
meanings.sent5: The mischarging of the phone battery caused it to swell up dangerously.
